name: py-azure-core
description: Microsoft Azure Core Library for Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-multiapi-storage
dependent_to.description:
Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library for Python with multi API version
support.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cosmos
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Cosmos Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Key Vault Secrets Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-mgmt-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Management Core Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-keyvault-keys
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Key Vault Keys Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-keyvault-certificates
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Key Vault Certificates Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-identity
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Identity Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-smart-open
dependent_to.description:
smart_open is a Python 2 & Python 3 library for efficient streaming of
very large files from/to S3, HDFS, WebHDFS, HTTP, or local storage. It
supports transparent, on-the-fly (de-)compression for a variety of
different formats.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-storage-blob
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Blob Storage Client Library for Python
